issue.title: [Java] Fix ComplexWriter backward incompatible change
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3859](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3859). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This commit <https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/a56c009257a71979d5ed0b021197c7a9d5ed5021> changed the default behavior for some of the methods to be non-backward compatible.

Will raise the PR to revert it to previous behavior while adhering to check style guidelines.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3859?focusedCommentId=16700787) by Siddharth Teotia (siddteotia):*
Resolved by PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3018
